task_title: Review Phase 12: US8 Prompt Integration with Core (T111-T121)
task_requirements:
Review the updated ARTK prompts.

**Files to Review in prompts/:**
- init.prompt.md - Updated to copy core and generate artk.config.yml
- foundation-build.prompt.md - Updated to import createPlaywrightConfig from core
- journey-implement.prompt.md - Updated to import fixtures, locators, assertions from core
- journey-validate.prompt.md - Updated to check for correct core API usage
- journey-verify.prompt.md - Updated to use core fixtures and harness

**Also review:**
- docs/PROMPT_TESTING.md - Testing guide for prompt validation

**Validation:**
- Prompts reference @artk/core/* modules
- AI assistants will generate code using core framework
- Testing guide is comprehensive
